message.name: ERR_MODIFY_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_RECORD_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The ID of the approval criteria record has not been specified

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_NAME_INVALID
message.locale: The name of the approval criteria is not valid

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_WORKFLOW_EVENT_INVALID
message.locale: A workflow event must be selected.

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_OCCURS_WHEN_INVALID
message.locale: The occurs when field is not valid

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_PRIORITY_INVALID
message.locale: The priority field is not valid

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_RECORD_STATUS_INVALID
message.locale: The record status for the approval criteria has an invalid value

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: The approval criteria record is already canceled
The approval criteria record is already cancelled

message.name: ERR_DETAILS_MODIFY_CANCELLED_RECORD
message.locale: Approval Criteria cannot be modified as it is already canceled
Approval Criteria cannot be modified as it is already cancelled

message.name: ERR_FV_PRIORITY_POSITIVE
message.locale: Priority must be a positive whole number.

message.name: ERR_XFV_ASSIGN_NEXT_PRIORITY_CANNOT_SELECT
message.locale: Assign Next Priority cannot be selected if a priority has been entered.

message.name: ERR_XFV_PRIORITY_BLANK
message.locale: Assign Next Priority must be selected if a priority has not been entered.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_FV_NAME_EXISTS
message.locale: An approval criteria with the name specified already exists. Approval Criteria name must be unique.

message.name: ERR_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_FV_ACTIVE_PLAN_ITEMS
message.locale: This Approval Criteria has active links to plan items so cannot be deleted

message.name: ERR_MORE_THAN_ONE_APPROVAL_CRITERIA_BEING_PROCESSED
message.locale: Planned item has more than one approval criteria being processed at the same time.
